main event: A brilliant white light, 20-30 ft. in diameter, was observed moving at fairly high speed and occasionally hovering at Thule Air Base on 15 November 1969.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3-5 minutes,The object was described as having no sound,The sighting involved both binoculars and naked eye observation,The witness estimated the object's distance at 5-10 miles,The object's movements included traveling in a straight line and moments of hovering.
witness description: The witness observed the light from a distance of 5-10 miles without sound.
